extensionDescription.message: A better (unofficial) dark theme for Microsoft Outlook™.

extensionLongDescription.message:
A Firefox add-on that applies a better dark mode to Microsoft Outlook and removes the ad sidebar. Compatible with Firefox mobile!
Also released on the Chrome Web Store here.
Outlook is a trademark of Microsoft and this project is not affiliated with or endorsed by Microsoft in any way.

optionsCustomDomainDescription.message: If your Outlook exchange server is running on a custom domain (ex. https://mail.yourcompany.com/owa), you can add it here so that the dark mode is applied for any page on this domain.
